system.description: Effect: The user recovers HP equal to 50% of their Max HP. While there is Sun, the user recovers HP equal to 2/3rds of their Max HP instead. In any other weather, the user recovers HP equal to 25% of their Max HP instead.

actions.name: Synthesis
actions.description: Effect: The user recovers HP equal to 50% of their Max HP. While there is Sun, the user recovers HP equal to 2/3rds of their Max HP instead. In any other weather, the user recovers HP equal to 25% of their Max HP instead.
